translation.en: [Marco] Do y'all wake up desperate to smash that snooze button?
Is the struggle to be a grown-up realer than real?
translation.ko: 어른이 된다는 게 생각보다 더 힘든가요?

translation.en: Do you have no idea what you're gonna do with your life?
translation.ko: 뭘 하고 살아야 할지 감도 안 오나요?

translation.en: I can't really help you with that 'cause I'm still figuring it all out too.
translation.ko: 그런 거라면 내 도움은 기대하지 마요 나도 아직 고민 중이거든요

translation.en: But, hey, even if we don't have all the answers,
we can still get gorgeous together.
Hey, guys. It's me, Marco.
And welcome back to the channel.
If you don't know me, then buckle up, bitch, because you're about to.
translation.ko: 날 모른다면 각오해요 지금부터 똑똑히 알려 주죠

translation.en: I am a makeup artist and beauty industry professional,
translation.ko: 난 메이크업 아티스트이자 뷰티 업계 전문가로

translation.en: working with all the major brands,
including the one, the only, the original Glamorous by Madolyn.
translation.ko: 그중 하나가 바로 이 세상에 둘도 없는 '글래머러스 바이 매덜린'이죠

translation.en: Click the link below for 10% off and enter MARCO at checkout.
I'm kind of an influencer. Maybe you've seen my content.
It's a little random...
Ooh, a little there.
You ain't never seen this before. Oh!
Or maybe you've seen my mom make an appearance.
translation.ko: 혹시 우리 엄마가 나오는 영상도 봤나요?

translation.en: She loves helping out with my content.
translation.ko: 엄마는 저랑 영상 찍는 걸 좋아해요

translation.en: Tell us about your beauty routine.
What beauty routine?
Come on. My viewers wanna know.
-What viewers? -[scoffs]
Rude.
Makeup is my life.
And not just because it's the only thing I'm good at.
translation.ko: 잘하는 게 이것밖에 없어서 그런 건 아니고요

translation.en: But because it gives me confidence
and it makes you feel like you're somebody.
And when you have your beat done right, you know you matter.
So if you wanna know more, like this video,
smash that subscribe button, and turn on notifications.
translation.ko: 내가 궁금하다면 '좋아요'랑 구독 버튼 누르고 알림 설정도 해 줘요

translation.en: Get into this gig, honey, because we are going places.
translation.ko: "마르코메히아 구독" 얼른 와, 자기야 끝내주는 모험을 해야지

translation.en: We are going to snatch that crown together.
And before you go, remember one thing.
You're beautiful. Say it back.
Okay. I'll be even later than normal to work.
translation.ko: 일하러 가야 하는데 평소보다 더 늦겠네요

translation.en: Why am I here?
Because I got you a job.
translation.ko: - 여긴 왜 불렀어요? - 왜냐하면 엄마가 네 일자리를 마련했거든

translation.en: There is an opening in the paralegal training program
translation.ko: 법률 보조원 연수 프로그램에 자리가 났길래

translation.en: and I called in a favor with the partners.
It's all yours.
We'll get that fixed. Then it's all yours.
I already have a job.
I'm a beauty professional, with a name tag and everything.
translation.ko: 난 뷰티 전문가예요 이름표까지 달고 있잖아요

translation.en: Marco, you are 22 years old,
and you sell makeup at the mall, part-time.
I'm sorry. Time's up.
You gotta join the real world. That starts with paying me rent.
translation.ko: 진짜 세상으로 나와야지 일단 나한테 월세부터 내

translation.en: -Rent? -Mm-hm.
To my mother?
Okay, that can't be legal.
I need a lawyer.
I know it's scary,
but you gotta start taking your life seriously.
You can't do that until you pay your way.
And who knows. You might even like it.
translation.ko: 혹시 아니? 막상 해 보면 재밌을지도

translation.en: I just thought my life would be more than this.
translation.ko: 내 인생은 이것보단 잘 풀릴 줄 알았거든요

translation.en: Yes, we all want more,
and sometimes we just have to be happy with enough.
[Marco] That's it for now, gorgeenas,
but remember this.
You are a star.
You are worth it.
And if anyone tries to tell you anything different,
don't listen to them, listen to you.
Even if they make a lot of sense
and you're starting to get worried they might be right.
translation.ko: 그 말이 맞을까 봐 슬슬 걱정되더라도요

translation.en: Oh. And don't forget, you're beautiful.
Say it back.
Hey, Marco. How's the channel going?
translation.ko: 안녕, 마르코 네 채널은 잘돼 가?

translation.en: Oh, wait, I don't care.
All I wanna know is how much product you can push at Carmen Sandiego over there.
translation.ko: 저 카르멘 산디아고한테 얼마나 파느냐가 중요하지

translation.en: Hey, Marco? You've got a job to do.
Go do it.
Hi. Is there anything I can help you with today?
I was hoping you could tell me.
Has anyone ever told you that you kind of look like...?
translation.ko: 혹시 누구 닮았다는 말 들어 보셨는지…

translation.en: [woman] Yeah. All the time.
It's you. You're Madolyn Addison.
Literally Madolyn Addison.
-What do I do? Bow? I'll bow. -Please, don't.
What are you doing buying your own makeup in the mall?
You should own the mall.
translation.ko: 쇼핑몰을 통째로 사실 수 있는 분이요

translation.en: I like to understand my customers. How they shop, what they like.
translation.ko: 내 고객들을 이해하고 싶어서 어떻게 쇼핑하고 뭘 좋아하는지

translation.en: You're looking at one of your customers right now.
My beat is full Glamorous by Madolyn as we speak.
translation.ko: 지금 제 메이크업도 전부 글래머러스로 완성했죠

translation.en: You think you can give me a makeover?
You want me to paint you?
The best way to sell product is to use product.
[Marco] So tell me something, the Madolyn Addison,
why does the supermodel of the world start a makeup empire?
translation.ko: 왜 세계적인 슈퍼 모델께서 화장품 사업을 시작하셨죠?

translation.en: Because nobody thought I could.
Oh, aren't you going in a little heavy with that contour?
With all due respect, this is Glamorous by Madolyn.
You can't go in too hard with 20 shades of beige.
Are you calling my makeup bland?
No, but can I be honest?
It doesn't sell like it used to.
Our customers feel like it's safe. It--
-It never changes. -We sell a classic look.
translation.ko: 고객들에겐 무난한 이미지라서요 변화가 없으니까요 우린 클래식한 이미지를 추구하거든

translation.en: Well, I know, but...
maybe your customers want more.
I know I do.
I need freedom.
I need to feel the fantasy.
I need to feel like anything is possible.
Because when I do my makeup in the morning,
I'm not some boy who lives with his mom and can't get a real job.
translation.ko: 번듯한 직장도 못 구해서 엄마랑 사는 애가 아니라

translation.en: I get to be a star, a diva.
I get to be anything that I want to be.
translation.ko: 제가 꿈꾸는 건 뭐든 될 수 있죠

translation.en: And that's what this is. I mean...
This is more than just paint or glitter.
It's therapy in a tube.
Magic in a jar.
Because this doesn't just touch your face.
translation.ko: 왜냐하면 화장은 얼굴에만 닿는 게 아니라

translation.en: It touches you.
It's beautiful.
I hate to ask this, but how would you feel
about helping me hit my sales goal this month?
translation.ko: 이달 판매 목표 채우게 좀 도와주실래요?

translation.en: -Wrap them all up. -Mm!
Do you like working here, Marco?
Um, yeah, but I have to quit soon.
My mom needs me to get a real job.
Really?
I think you might have something important to say about makeup.
translation.ko: 자기는 메이크업에 관한 철학이 있는 모양인데

translation.en: And I know someone who might be hiring.
This woman already has an assistant, but she's still gonna hire you?
Yes. As her second assistant.
Like Andy in The Devil Wears Prada,
except I don't even need a makeover, I'm already snatched.
translation.ko: 난 메이크오버가 필요 없죠 이미 쩔어 주니까요

translation.en: I know how much it means to you to be in beauty or fashion or whatever,
translation.ko: 뷰티인지 패션인지 하는 일이 너한테 중요한 건 알지만

translation.en: but you can't turn down the paralegal program for some minimum-wage job.
translation.ko: 최저 시급이나 받으려고 법률 보조원 자리를 마다해?

translation.en: It pays 20 an hour.
With overtime.
And benefits.
It sounds too good to be true.
You take this job, you'll wake up in a tub of ice with a kidney missing.
translation.ko: 거기 출근하면 신장 털린 채로 얼음 욕조에서 깰걸?

translation.en: I can't allow it.
Why not? It pays the rent.
Because it's the easy way out.
And you never want to do the work.
My videos take hours to edit.
-I do the work. -And where's it gotten you?
translation.ko: - 내 일도 어려워요 - 그래서 뭘 이뤘니?

translation.en: Nowhere.
I'm stuck.
If I don't do something with my life that matters to me,
translation.ko: 원하지도 않는 일을 하며 살아야 한다면

translation.en: then why do anything at all?
Well, I just thought that you'd want to work with me,
translation.ko: 난 또 네가 엄마랑 일하고 싶어 할 줄 알았지

translation.en: your mom, you know, the person that raised you and loves you.
translation.ko: 난 또 네가 엄마랑 일하고 싶어 할 줄 알았지 널 키워 주고 사랑하는 나랑

translation.en: I'm wearing this new serum that blocks me from the powers of your guilt.
translation.ko: 죄책감 자극해 봤자 이 신상 세럼이 다 튕겨 내요

translation.en: Fine. Prosecution rests.
-You mean--? -Go have fun at your fancy new job.
translation.ko: - 그럼… - 그 대단한 회사 재밌게 다녀

translation.en: Oh, my God. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
Hey, listen. Hey. Tell me one thing.
What does "snatched" mean?
Dressed nice with good makeup.
That's what I thought.
Hi, I'm Marco Mejia.
-I'm Miss Addison's new assistant. -[woman] You're late.
-Sorry, the train took forever. -Work on that.
I'm Venetia Kelaher, I'm Madolyn's first assistant.
translation.ko: 난 베니시아 켈러허야 매덜린의 제1 비서지

translation.en: As far as you're concerned, I'm everything and everyone that matters to you during your time here,
translation.ko: 넌 여기서 일하는 동안 나만 보고 살면 돼

translation.en: for however long, or short, that might last.
So pay attention because I don't repeat myself.
translation.ko: 그러니 집중해 난 두 번 말 안 하거든

translation.en: Any questions? Good. Follow me.
Glamorous by Madolyn is
one of the industry's most respected beauty brands.
translation.ko: 글래머러스 바이 매덜린은 업계에서 손꼽히는 명망 높은 뷰티 브랜드인데

translation.en: And that is thanks in no small part to our director of sales,
translation.ko: 거기에 적잖이 기여한 우리 영업 이사는

translation.en: Madolyn's son, Chad Addison.
Oh, my God. His abs have abs.
Yours would too if you worked out six times a day.
translation.ko: 매일 여섯 번씩 운동하면 너도 저렇게 돼

translation.en: Is that the superstar Mom hired from the mall?
He has a name.
Marco Mejia.
Aw. Nice heels, Marco. I got ones just like them.
translation.ko: 하이힐 멋지네, 마르코 나도 그런 거 있는데

translation.en: [Marco] Wait, really? Are we the same size?
That was a joke.
I was joking.
I forgot to warn you.
Chad's funny.
Yeah, I mean, heels?
Me?
I'm gay, but I'm not...
gay.
Was that another joke?
Okay, let's go before we have to get HR involved.
translation.ko: 자, 이만 가자 이러다 인사 팀 불러야겠네

translation.en: I'm sensing a little tension between you and Chad back there.
Well, some of us worked to be here and some won the lucky-sperm lottery.
translation.ko: 누구는 노력해서 여기까지 왔는데 누구는 부모를 잘 만났잖니

translation.en: But I keep it profesh. Mostly.
So this is Product Design.
Every piece of artwork, branding and packaging
translation.ko: 매덜린 책상에 올라가는 아트워크, 브랜딩과 패키징은

translation.en: that lands on Madolyn's desk starts here.
translation.ko: 매덜린 책상에 올라가는 아트워크, 브랜딩과 패키징은 전부 여기서 기획해

translation.en: Ben, Britt, this is Marco, Madolyn's new Second.
translation.ko: 벤, 브릿 이쪽은 마르코야 매덜린의 제2 비서지

translation.en: Hi, I'm Marco.
Yeah, you are.
Um, any questions? Do you want any help?
Are you thirsty? I barely had a sip.
He gets like this when he's excited.
I don't get like anything, especially when excited, which I am not.
translation.ko: 흥분해도 평소랑 똑같은데? 지금은 흥분도 안 했고

translation.en: But I could be.
Why is she even talking about this?
Welcome to the fam, Marco.
Take care of him. I think he's a keeper.
translation.ko: 잘 챙겨 줘, 괜찮은 친구 같네

translation.en: Only 'cause you asked nicely.
-You're into him. -I am into nothing.
-Go away. -Mm.
So it's, like, my favorite movie, but it is bad.
translation.ko: 제 최애 영화이긴 한데 솔직히 구리죠

translation.en: Finally, my social media intern.
No. This is Marco Mejia, Madolyn's personally-handpicked Second.
translation.ko: 아닌데요 이쪽은 마르코 메히아예요 매덜린이 직접 고른 제2 비서죠

translation.en: -Oh. -Marco, this is Alyssa.
She produces original content across all of our social media platforms,
translation.ko: 우리 소셜 미디어 플랫폼에 올릴 신규 콘텐츠를 제작하지

translation.en: featuring our newest products showcased by our influencer-partners.
Alyssa says welcome to Glamorous by Madolyn.
She also does that. A lot.
I create content too. You should follow me.
I would, but you only have a thousand followers.
translation.ko: 그러고 싶은데 팔로워가 1천 명밖에 안 되네

translation.en: And half of them are bots, so I can't. It would destroy my brand.
translation.ko: 심지어 절반은 봇이네 팔로우 못 해 내 이미지 깎일라

translation.en: I have a feet account with more followers than that.
translation.ko: 내 발 계정도 너보단 팔로워가 많아

translation.en: Her feet account is blowing up.
But Alyssa says we should collab. I'll drag you into five figures.
translation.ko: 얼리사가 콜라보하자네 팔로워 다섯 자리로 늘려 줄게

translation.en: Find my assistant Nowhere, he'll set it up.
-"Nowhere"? -I love beauty.
Um, is he serious?
Um, yeah, he is.
Are you?
You scared yet?
No way, Shantay. I'm here to slay.
translation.ko: 그럴 리가요 난 여기 빛나러 온걸요

translation.en: You have a five-year plan, right?
Five years? That's two whole Gaga eras.
translation.ko: 5년이면 레이디 가가 음반이 두 번은 나올 텐데요

translation.en: In five years, I'm gonna run my own beauty company.
translation.ko: 난 5년 안에 내 뷰티 회사를 차릴 거야

translation.en: And that takes connections.
But if you make it here,
you can open any door in the business.
translation.ko: 이 업계에선 어느 문이든 열 수 있어

translation.en: Whatever you do, don't touch anything.
Oh. Hello. [chuckles]
It all feels like yesterday.
Do you ever miss it?
-Mm. The '80s? God, no. -Mm.
Too much mousse and not enough tweezing.
translation.ko: 무스 범벅에 다들 털 관리도 안 했잖아

translation.en: I mean, modeling.
The fashion, the parties, the men...
The drugs, which I was far too young to experience.
translation.ko: 마약까지? 나야 어려서 못 해 봤지만

translation.en: No, that party's over.
I run a business now and that might not sound as exciting,
translation.ko: 난 이제 사업을 하는데 그게 모델 일만큼 짜릿하진 않아도

translation.en: but it's definitely rewarding.
That's great.
You sound very... comfortable.
Comfortable?
I like confidence in my employees, Marco.
As long as they have the skills to back it up.
Venetia?
Hey, gorgeenas. It's me, Marco.
It has been a whole week since I started my gig at Glamorous by Madolyn.
And I am back-back-back-back-back again
to give you the slay-by-slay.
So, what's it take to make it in makeup?
Focus. You gotta step it up and do the heavy lifting.
And believe me, I am.
Yikes. It went everywhere.
There is nothing they could throw at me that I could not catch.
translation.ko: 난 어떤 시련이 닥쳐도 극복할 수 있어요

translation.en: In the real world, I stick out.
-But here, I stand out. -Hi. Hold. Hold. Hold.
I'm thriving.
This job is like a breath of fresh air.
-How's the new kid doing? -[scoffs]
He is flopping like a Katy Perry single.
Good. I was worried.
Worried? Why?
You remember how you got your job?
Madolyn hired me to be her Second.
-Mm-hm. -Right before she fired her First.
But he's a flop, so you're fine. Right?
Right.
[Marco] That's it for now for me, gorgeenas,
but I'll be back tomorrow living the dream every day with you.
translation.ko: 대신 내일도 찾아와서 매일 여러분과 꿈을 이루며 살아갈래요

translation.en: 'Cause we're only getting started.
But before I go, remember this.
You're beautiful. Say it back.
You realize this is exactly what we sent Sephora last year?
translation.ko: 이거 작년에 세포라로 보낸 거랑 똑같은 거 알지?

translation.en: Correction. It's what we sent everyone last year.
translation.ko: 실은 모든 소매점에 똑같은 곤돌라를 보냈죠

translation.en: Maybe this is why retail is down year after year.
Sure. Okay.
We could take some risks,
shake things up.
Or...
[woman on TV] What makes you beautiful?
We do. Vendemiaire.
Forty-two brands, six continents, one you.
Vendemiaire. You're more than beauty, more than ever.
We could sell to the biggest beauty empire in the world
translation.ko: 세계 최고의 뷰티 기업에 우리 회사를 팔아서

translation.en: and get ugly rich.
You finally heard back? I thought they weren't interested.
translation.ko: 드디어 회답 왔어? 관심 없다는 줄 알았더니

translation.en: Well, they are. Very.
And the best part is, they want to keep you and your creative voice.
You get to stay in control. You get to stay in charge.
And we get the money we need to grow, to expand...
translation.ko: 우린 그 돈으로 성장하고 사업을 확장하고…

translation.en: To innovate?
Let's leave the lip glitter to TikTok. We're a heritage brand.
translation.ko: 립 글리터는 틱톡에서나 갖고 놀라죠 - 우린 전통 있는 브랜드잖아요 - 밋밋하다는 뜻이겠지

translation.en: You mean, we're bland.
translation.ko: - 우린 전통 있는 브랜드잖아요 - 밋밋하다는 뜻이겠지

translation.en: We're successful,
unlike the 90% of new brands that fail in our space every year.
We're about to get a lifeline to preserve your legacy.
translation.ko: 엄마의 유산을 지킬 구명줄이 내려오게 생겼는데

translation.en: Let's not throw that away.
Meeting's in five.
Venetia, is Marco back?
He's just picked up the new samples. He's practically in the elevator.
translation.ko: 방금 새 샘플 받았다니까 금방 튀어 오겠죠

translation.en: Probably got busy creating content for his channel.
translation.ko: 자기 채널에 올릴 콘텐츠 만드느라 바쁜가 봐요

translation.en: Ever notice how he's always on his phone?
I like him. He's got a point of view, he's interesting.
translation.ko: 난 마르코 좋더라 자기주장이 있고 흥미롭잖아

translation.en: We need that here.
He has our customers' perspective.
We're missing that.
What's that matter if you can't do the work?
What do you think?
Give him some time. He'll be fine.
I'll show him the ropes. Not like I'm going anywhere, right?
translation.ko: 제가 잘 가르칠게요 저야 계속 이 자리에 있을 테니까요

translation.en: Okay.
-Come on, come on. -[cell phone beeps]
Yes. Yes, yes, yes.
Hi.
I'm Marco. I need you to drive stupid fast. I'm already late.
translation.ko: 내가 마르코예요 미친 듯이 밟아 줘요 벌써 늦었거든요

translation.en: Hi, Marco.
I'm Parker.
You're, uh... You're in my Uber.
Check again, straight boy. Mine's a black Prius.
translation.ko: 확인해 봐요, 이성애자님 난 검은색 프리우스 불렀네요

translation.en: Uh, mine is too, and you're in it. See?
translation.ko: 내 차도 마찬가지인데 당신이 탔잖아요, 봐요

translation.en: Of course I got in the wrong Uber.
I messed up everything else this week, why not this?
translation.ko: 이번 주 내내 삽질했는데 그럼 그렇지!

translation.en: Hey. Hey, hey, chew your food.
It's gonna be fine.
Hope I remembered to wear waterproof 'cause I'm gonna cry.
translation.ko: 방수 마스카라 했던가? 눈물 터질 것 같은데!

translation.en: No. You're not.
Where you going?
Hudson Yards.
Me too. Lucky us.
Your day's getting better by the minute.
Trust me, it's just gonna get worse.
Tough job?
Yeah.
I'm flopping harder than a Terminator sequel.
I don't even know why. It's makeup.
I am makeup.
I can't do it.
It's hard. It's a real job.
What am I gonna do?
You're gonna not give up.
You can do hard things, right?
Right.
Hey, don't be too hard on yourself.
We all make mistakes.
Aw, crap.
Hey. I know I'm supposed to be here, but do I have to be here?
translation.ko: 저기요, 여기 있으라곤 했지만 꼭 여기 있어야 하나요?

translation.en: 'Cause I'm already bored.
Sorry, I'm late. There was traffic.
[Britt] Did you ask him out yet?
[scoffs] Yeah, yeah. We're going out this Neverday at Never o'clock.
Ask him. If he says no, I'll hit him.
translation.ko: 말이라도 꺼내 봐 너 퇴짜 맞으면 내가 후리게

translation.en: -That's assault. Now I'm an accessory. -Okay.
translation.ko: 후리면 폭력이지 - 나도 방조범이 됐네 - 알았어

translation.en: I'm not asking anyone out who works here, okay?
translation.ko: - 난 동료한테 데이트 신청 안 해 - 그만하라고!

translation.en: [Madolyn] Chad, you're up.
When I first came here from Stanford, I didn't know what a gondola was.
translation.ko: 스탠퍼드 졸업하고 여기 왔을 땐 곤돌라가 뭔지도 몰랐습니다

translation.en: "Gondolas? Those are those little boats in Italy, right?"
Wrong, Chad!
I mean, yes, they are those boats in Italy and in other places.
translation.ko: 네, 이탈리아에 그런 배가 있긴 하지만

translation.en: But to us, they are so much more.
To us, they are these big shiny things
that display our products in retail locations,
filled with mirrors and lights,
and the fingerprints of ladies touching them.
And to the consumer, a gondola can be more motivating to a purchase
translation.ko: 고객 입장에선 곤돌라가 그 무엇보다 구매욕을 자극하죠

translation.en: than all of our marketing combined.
translation.ko: 모든 마케팅 수단을 더한 것보다 더요

translation.en: And that is a fact you can't make up.
translation.ko: 그건 화장품으로도 가릴 수 없는 팩트죠

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Ladies and gentlemen, after six months of research and redesign,
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분 6개월에 걸친 연구와 재디자인 끝에

translation.en: I am so proud to present to you
the all-new gondola from Glamorous by Madolyn.
New? It's the same.
Uh... Well, no, Mom, look, the knobs are round now, so...
That took six months of research?
The research showed us that people already liked the gondolas.
translation.ko: 연구 결과 사람들은 이 곤돌라를 좋아한다는데

translation.en: Why redesign what really works?
-Why redesign to begin with? -Exactly.
translation.ko: - 애초에 디자인을 왜 바꾸냐고? - 바로 그거예요

translation.en: I need to see the new prototypes in the gondola.
translation.ko: 신제품 프로토타입을 저 곤돌라에 전시해 봐

translation.en: -Oh, Marco has them. -Oh, yeah.
I think I left them in my Uber.
This hasn't been your week, has it?
I'm sorry. This will not happen again.
translation.ko: 죄송해요 다신 이런 일 없을 거예요

translation.en: Oh, you're right. It won't.
Am I fired?
You lost product prototypes.
Trade secrets.
-Of course, you are fired! -[microphone feedback]
I'm sorry this didn't work out.
-Really? -Yes.
I know my time here was short,
but I won't forget a thing.
And I have a feeling you won't either.
-Let's get back to work. Shall we? -Thank you.
Okay, so Uber can't tell us which car Marco left the samples in
translation.ko: 샘플을 어느 차에 두고 내렸는지 우버 본사도 모른대요

translation.en: because it wasn't his,
and they won't give us a rundown of all rides ending at Hudson Yards
translation.ko: 허드슨 야즈에서 내린 승객을 다 알려 줄 수도 없고요

translation.en: because of privacy, so basically we have a problem.
translation.ko: 허드슨 야즈에서 내린 승객을 다 알려 줄 수도 없고요 개인 정보 때문이라나? 그러니 큰일이죠

translation.en: If Vendemiaire finds out we can't protect our own IP,
translation.ko: 우리가 지식 재산도 못 지키는 걸 방데미에르 측에 들키면

translation.en: the whole sale is effed.
Not if we start over.
Start over? What do you mean?
You wanna throw out the product prototypes?
We're trying to sell the company. It's a bad time to be playing around.
translation.ko: 엄마, 회사를 매각하려는데 경솔하게 굴면 안 되죠

translation.en: -Then we don't sell. I won't play it safe. -Whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.ko: 그럼 매각하지 마 난 몸 사릴 생각 없어

translation.en: You think I play it safe?
I didn't say that.
But it feels like you did. What does that mean?
-You think I don't have ideas? -Oh, Chad.
It's about that kid you hired at the mall, isn't it?
Some twink in heels swoops in
and suddenly your own son can't even get through to you.
translation.ko: 졸지에 아들 말도 안 들어 주시잖아요

translation.en: It's just...
Marco understood what our customers want.
translation.ko: 마르코는 우리 고객들이 뭘 원하는지 이해하거든

translation.en: And I don't?
You know what? Don't worry about it.
I'll get on the horn and do all the work to fix this before it's too late.
translation.ko: 전 늦기 전에 전화 돌려서 열심히 수습이나 하죠

translation.en: And I hope it is good enough for you.
Okay. Okay.
Okay. Um...
[Britt] Venetia?
Venetia, what are you doing down there?
I don't know. What are you doing up there?
translation.ko: 글쎄, 넌 거기 서서 뭐 해?

translation.en: Dropping off the new selects.
You're on Madolyn's computer.
No, I'm not.
Is this another made-up crisis that you overthink and overreact to?
translation.ko: - 아니거든? - 또 가짜 위기를 지어내선 괜히 고민하고 오버하는 거야?

translation.en: Hmm? Whatever it is, it's not too late to fix.
This is not a made-up crisis.
This one is a real crisis because you were right.
Madolyn hired Marco to replace me. I need to get into her laptop to prove it.
translation.ko: 매덜린은 내 대타로 마르코를 고용했어 매덜린 노트북을 열어서 확인만 하면 돼

translation.en: I just need something I can lift her fingerprint off of...
translation.ko: 매덜린 지문을 채취할 만한 물건이 필요한데

translation.en: She fired Marco. You're fine.
Do you think she'd ever promote someone she wanted to fire?
translation.ko: 해고하려는 직원은 승진도 안 시켜 주시려나?

translation.en: I've been here three years without a promotion.
translation.ko: 난 3년을 일하면서 승진 한번 못 했잖아

translation.en: I thought maybe it's because we're a small company.
Only so many seats at the table, gotta wait your turn, right?
translation.ko: 자리가 많지 않으니 내 순서를 기다리자고

translation.en: But what if that's not it? What if she's just... over it?
translation.ko: 근데 그게 아니라 매덜린이 나한테 질린 거라면?

translation.en: -I know one way you'll get fired. -Hmm?
Getting caught hacking her MacBook.
Now go home,
-light this... -Mm.
...watch some Shonda, and don't do anything crazy.
translation.ko: 숀다 라임스 드라마나 보고 미친 짓은 하지 마

translation.en: -All right. Okay. -All right.
Come on.
-Thanks for the Turtle Tracks. -I had a feeling you were gonna need it.
translation.ko: 아이스크림 감사해요 왠지 필요할 것 같더라

translation.en: I couldn't swing it.
-You were right. -Of course. I'm always right.
translation.ko: - 엄마 말이 맞았어요 - 내 말이야 늘 옳지

translation.en: I thought I had it all figured out.
I was finally gonna do something exciting, and I found what I was supposed to do.
translation.ko: 마침내 신나는 일을 하게 됐고 이게 내 운명이라고 생각했죠

translation.en: I didn't want my job at first.
I wanted more. I had plans.
And then Voldemort showed up, and a little while later, you did.
translation.ko: 그러다 볼드모트를 만났고 얼마 안 가서 네가 생겼지

translation.en: You shouldn't call Dad that anymore. J.K.'s, like, extremely canceled.
translation.ko: 아빠 그렇게 부르지 마요 J.K. 롤링은 캔슬됐잖아요

translation.en: Before he came along,
I was gonna go to an Ivy League law school or at least a good one.
translation.ko: 아이비리그나 괜찮은 학교의 로스쿨에 가려고 했어

translation.en: I was gonna be a white-shoe lawyer,
and work in the city, and drink cocktails,
and balance my personal life and professional life.
translation.ko: 도시에서 일하며 칵테일도 마시고 워라밸도 지키면서 살고 싶었는데

translation.en: But instead I'm a single mom who files trademarks for a living.
translation.ko: 상표 등록으로 먹고사는 싱글 맘이 됐잖니

translation.en: You are the only thing I've done that matters.
translation.ko: 내가 유일하게 잘한 일은 널 낳은 거야

translation.en: That's why I'm hard. That's why I care.
You are my more.
And if you waste your life,
then I've wasted mine.
I can't believe I'm gonna say this. You have to go back.
translation.ko: 내가 이런 말을 할 줄이야 회사로 돌아가

translation.en: You're going back to Glamorous tomorrow. You're gonna get your job back.
translation.ko: 내일 글래머러스로 돌아가서 네 자리를 되찾으렴

translation.en: -I am? -Yes, you are.
Because taking a risk is scary, but watching you give up is terrifying.
translation.ko: 모험은 두려운 일이지만 포기하는 네 모습을 보는 건 더 끔찍하거든

translation.en: Okay, I can't just march in there and demand my job back.
translation.ko: 어떻게 불쑥 쳐들어가서 내 자리 내놓으라고 해요?

translation.en: -I messed up. I lost their samples. -Then find them.
translation.ko: 내가 샘플을 분실한걸요 - 그럼 찾아내 - 어떻게요?

translation.en: -Girl, how? -You're always on your phone.
translation.ko: - 그럼 찾아내 - 어떻게요? 네가 붙들고 사는 폰도 어디 쓸모가 있겠지

translation.en: It's good for something, right?
translation.ko: 네가 붙들고 사는 폰도 어디 쓸모가 있겠지

translation.en: Hmm. I left them in an Uber with somebody dressed for the gym.
translation.ko: 그 우버에 탄 남자는 헬스장 가는 차림이었는데

translation.en: Do people Uber to the gym?
-Was he white? -Okay, yep, that explains it.
There's an Equinox at Hudson Yards.
That's where he was headed. I bet you I can find him there.
translation.ko: 그리 갔나 본데 거기로 찾아가면 되겠죠

translation.en: How? You don't have a membership. That place is expensive.
translation.ko: 어떻게? 넌 회원권도 없고 거기 비싼 데잖아

translation.en: You're right. I'm not a member.
I'm a scammer.
-Too bad about Marco, huh? -Yeah.
At least you can ask him out now. Since he doesn't work here anymore.
translation.ko: 그래도 이제 데이트는 신청할 수 있겠네 더는 동료가 아니니까

translation.en: -[Ben] I don't have his number. -I do.
Well, I don't want to, okay?
It'd be creepy and weird, and he'd probably say no.
I mean, look at him.
Look at me.
But if I did ask him out-- And I won't.
translation.ko: 데이트 신청할 거라면… 그럴 일은 없지만

translation.en: --what do I say?
Anything.
Just say it loud.
Sometimes in life, if you want something, you gotta do whatever it takes to get it.
So crazy question, but if I wanted to cancel this tomorrow,
translation.ko: 황당한 질문이긴 한데 내일 등록 취소하면 돈은 안 빠져나가겠죠?

translation.en: I wouldn't get charged, right?
translation.ko: 내일 등록 취소하면 돈은 안 빠져나가겠죠?

translation.en: Just, like, in theory?
[instructor] Now left. Right.
Once strong.
Parker?
Yeah?
It's me, Marco. I--
I left something in your Uber the other day.
translation.ko: 전에 당신 우버에 뭘 두고 내려서요

translation.en: Yeah, you did.
I have it right here.
-You do? -Yeah. Uh...
Oh. Technically, it's mine now...
but I guess I can do you a solid.
You have no idea how much you saved my life.
translation.ko: 방금 사람 한 명 살린 거예요

translation.en: -What's in there? -None of your business, straight boy.
But, also, thank you. Seriously. [chuckles]
-I gotta go. -Can I give you some advice
before you run away?
Pay a little more attention to, uh...
who you're calling straight boy. Yeah?
See you around.
Love this for me.
-Marco. -Hey, you can't just walk in here.
I'm a twink on PrEP, I can do anything.
translation.ko: 전 프렙 먹는 꼬마 게이예요 뭐든 할 수 있죠

translation.en: Oh. Our samples.
-How? -I used my phone.
I may not be good at everything, but I am good at that.
translation.ko: 제가 다른 건 몰라도 그거 하나는 잘하거든요

translation.en: Great. But if you think that means you get your job back--
Let him say what he came here to say.
translation.ko: 무슨 말을 하려는 건지 일단 듣기나 해

translation.en: I'm not perfect.
I have a lot to learn.
I am bad at math, the oldest movie I've seen is Titanic,
translation.ko: 수학은 못하고 '타이타닉' 이전 영화는 본 적도 없고

translation.en: and I don't know who Cher is.
I may be young and flaky and unrealistic,
translation.ko: 전 어리고 유별나고 현실 감각도 없지만

translation.en: but I can fix that.
I can put down my phone down once in a while, and I can learn.
translation.ko: 가끔은 휴대폰을 내려놓고 배우면서 성장할 수 있다고요

translation.en: I can grow.
The question is, can you?
'Cause this gondola is a joke.
I mean, of course, it's the same. Everything here is the same.
translation.ko: 당연히 예전이랑 똑같겠죠 여긴 뭐든지 똑같고

translation.en: Nothing here has changed.
Except for you.
What happened to that queen who built this company
translation.ko: 모두가 자기 능력을 의심해서 이 회사를 세운

translation.en: because everyone told her she couldn't?
Who got off on proving people wrong?
translation.ko: 남이 틀렸다는 걸 증명하고 쾌감을 느끼시던 분이

translation.en: You've been so focused on what people want,
you completely forgot what people need.
Inspiration. Love. Light.
You have the most important job in the world.
You give people like me a reason to get up in the morning.
translation.ko: 저 같은 사람들이 아침에 눈뜰 이유를 주시죠

translation.en: And you give us the chance to be anything we wanna be.
translation.ko: 뭐든 꿈꾸는 대로 될 수 있는 기회도 주시고요

translation.en: But if you really have given up,
then I'm gonna walk out that door.
translation.ko: 근데 진심으로 포기하신 거라면 저는 문밖으로 나가서

translation.en: And I'm gonna stay gone.
Well...
thank you, Marco.
-Venetia, throw those samples away. -What?
translation.ko: 베니시아, 저 샘플들 버려 - 뭐라고요? - 곤돌라도 폐기해

translation.en: And that gondola too. We can do better.
translation.ko: - 뭐라고요? - 곤돌라도 폐기해 더 잘할 수 있잖아

translation.en: No, Mom. The gondola is--
We have the best customers in this business.
translation.ko: 우린 업계 최고의 고객들을 보유하고 있잖아

translation.en: And I want us to feel the same way they do when they use our products.
translation.ko: 우리도 우리 제품을 쓰는 고객들처럼 느껴 보자

translation.en: Like anything is possible.
I hope you brought a change of clothes.
I don't think those shorts are work-appropriate.
Does she mean...?
She's giving you a second chance.
Use it.
Move, I'm gay!
I'm Ben.
Yeah, you work with that girl in Product Design.
translation.ko: 네, 제품 디자인 팀에서 그 여자분이랑 일하잖아요

translation.en: I do? Oh, yeah. I mean, of course, I--
I'm Ben.
Wanna get a drink sometime?
-You mean, like a date? -[elevator bell dings]
No. That's outrageous.
We work together.
No, I just mean to hang out.
You seem cool.
I do?
Yes.
Oh, okay. Yeah.
Uh, just, you know, hit me up or something.
Okay.
-Someone's in a good mood. -Me?
No, no. I'm in a normal mood.
-You did it. You asked him out. -I asked no one out. That's crazy.
translation.ko: 데이트 신청했구나? 데이트는 무슨 미쳤나 봐, 넌 미쳤어

translation.en: -You're crazy. Yeah. -No, I'm not.
translation.ko: 데이트는 무슨 미쳤나 봐, 넌 미쳤어 - 아닌데 - 미쳤잖아

translation.en: Get to work.
Vogue Italia, Dazed, i-D, an iced coffee for you,
translation.ko: 보그 이탈리아 데이즈드, 아이-디 선배 아이스커피랑

translation.en: and a triple latte, extra foam, double cup for our queen.
translation.ko: 여왕님 드릴 트리플 라테에 거품이랑 컵도 추가했죠

translation.en: -Nice hustle. -Mm.
And in stilettos no less.
Girl, if I need kitten heels to do my job, I am not doing my job.
translation.ko: 키튼 힐 신고 일할 바에는 안 하는 게 낫죠

translation.en: I have to use the restroom,
so why don't you handle the phones and bring Madolyn her coffee?
I am not gonna let you flop.
Hi, Madolyn. Can I just say, I--?
Marco, this job isn't just glitter and glamour.
translation.ko: 마르코, 이 일은 마냥 화려하지 않아

translation.en: It's hard work too.
Makeup can help you decide who you want to be today,
translation.ko: 오늘 누가 되고 싶은지는 화장의 도움으로 정해도

translation.en: but who you become...
translation.ko: 오늘 누가 되고 싶은지는 화장의 도움으로 정해도 누가 되느냐는

translation.en: that's up to you.
That is iconic.
I have to go write that down.
-[phone ringing] -Answer that first.
[Marco] Yeah.
Venetia.
-How are you liking the new kid? -Marco?
Um, he's fun. He's smart.
translation.ko: 마르코요? 재밌던데요 똑똑하니 일주일 안에 내 자리를 뺏겠죠

translation.en: He's probably gonna have my job in a week. Glad you asked, Chad.
translation.ko: 똑똑하니 일주일 안에 내 자리를 뺏겠죠 물어봐 줘서 고맙네요

translation.en: -You don't like him, do you? -No, I like him.
translation.ko: - 마음에 안 드는군요? - 아뇨, 마음엔 들어요

translation.en: I just hate the fact he'll steal my job because your mom is,
translation.ko: 내 자리를 뺏는 게 싫은 거죠 어머님께서 나한테 질리신 모양이라서요

translation.en: what, bored with me, I guess?
I don't get it. He's been here a week,
translation.ko: 이해가 안 돼요 온 지 일주일 만에 엄마 머릿속을 죄다 헤집다니

translation.en: and he's causing her to rethink everything.
translation.ko: 온 지 일주일 만에 엄마 머릿속을 죄다 헤집다니

translation.en: He's gonna eff up the Vendemiaire deal, I just know it.
translation.ko: 방데미에르 매각 건도 그 녀석이 망치겠죠

translation.en: Well, I guess we're both screwed.
Not if we do something about it.
Like what?
We ruin that twink.
Take him out, kick him back to the makeup counter from which he came.
You want me to get Marco fired to save my job?
translation.ko: 내 밥그릇 지키자고 마르코를 잘리게 하라고요?

translation.en: Sorry, Chad, I just don't swim on that side of the pool.
translation.ko: 미안해요, 채드 난 그딴 짓 안 해요

translation.en: This might sound harsh,
but this business is not all glitter and glamour.
We are warriors who make contour cream.
We are soldiers who sell lipliner.
You wanna win?
Then you are going to have to fight.
[Marco] What's it take to make it in makeup?
Focus.
[Venetia] If you make it here, you can open any door in the business.
translation.ko: "이번 시즌 이야기" 여기서 성공하면 이 업계에선 어느 문이든 열 수 있어

translation.en: Pick your fights, especially when they're against the boss's son.
translation.ko: 함부로 싸우지 마 특히 상대가 대표님 아들이라면

translation.en: You really are so fun to have around.
I have to get this right. People are counting on me.
translation.ko: 제대로 해내야 해 많은 사람을 책임지고 있거든

translation.en: -You need to trust yourself. -How close are you guys?
Does she talk about me?
He's funny. He's cute. He worships me.
That would be unprofessional.
Wait, I know you. You're Marco's boy.
Did he call me that?
[Britt] He has another guy.
If you want something, you gotta do whatever it takes to get it.
One scoop of this and things get real serious.
There is nothing they could throw at me that I could not catch.
translation.ko: 난 어떤 시련이 닥쳐도 극복할 수 있어요

translation.en: Hello, Marco.
[Madolyn] I'm going to need all of your creative talent
to say something that matters.
And I ain't too proud to say I came up with that tagline.
-It's from a really old song I heard. -It's not that old.
translation.ko: - 옛날 노래에서 땄어요 - 그렇게 오래되지 않았어

translation.en: -It's a really old song. -It's not.
